title: Patched 6.18, Black Firewall Screen
body:
So tried to queue up for a game with a buddy of mine, we're sitting next to eachother using the same internet. He can connect without any issues and I can't. I was able to play a game directly before the patch. Now I get the black screen when trying to connect to a game. I'm attempting a repair atm to see if that fixes it. Anyone have any ideas for a fix?

EDIT: Repairing did not fix the issue
-Made sure I added any and all exceptions to windows firewall and defender, even tried disabling both of them and it didn't work.
-I've restarted my computer completely and I still get the black screen.
-It's all game modes.

replies.body:
The black firewall screen is often the result of your connection not being stable to the servers. Patches only change local files inside your league directory, therefore they're *very unlikely* to have impacted your connection. Local settings on your PC are the most common causes for your issue, so I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change with your problem.

Also thank you for your reply.

So, it wasn't really a connection issue. I did a region change and then changed back and whatever it patched fixed the issue.

EXAMPLE: Change to Latin America North or EUW and the game will patch for their location.  Close then re-open league and change back to NA. It should patch again. I'm guessing it applies the most recent patch for that region and as a result fixed whatever issue the game was having.
